title: Hermeneutic Work-Based Learning Design in Complex Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic social sciences and business processes
context.additional_context: Parallel implementation of real-time collaboration and asynchronous learning activities using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners will apply a hermeneutic analysis framework to interpret uncertainties arising in complex work environments.
Based on complexity theory, learners will recognize the limitations of pre-designed work guidelines and develop situational response strategies.
Through team-based simulations, learners will perform distributed representational activities and experience learning continuity from multiple perspectives.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
